Spectrogram Annotations
=======================

Overview
--------

Spectrogram Annotations allow the user to make marks on the [spectrogram display](../../../displays/spectrogramDisplayHelp/docs/UserDisplay_Spectrogram.html) and add a small amount of text to go with each mark.

![Image](./images/annotations.png)

  
  

They can be used either in [real time](../../../overview/PamMasterHelp/docs/normalMode.html) or offline using the [PAMGuard viewer](../../../overview/PamMasterHelp/docs/viewerMode.html)

Data from the marks are stored in the [PAMGuard Database](../../generalDatabaseHelp/docs/database_database.html)
